Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class PLST

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.LabelTransformationClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.PLST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class PLST
extends LabelTransformationClassifier
implements weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    PLST - Principal Label Space Transformation. Uses SVD to generate a matrix that transforms the label space. This implementation is adapted from the MatLab implementation provided by the authors at Github
    See: Farbound Tai and Hsuan-Tien Lin. Multilabel classification with principal label space transformation. Neural Computation, 24(9):2508--2542, September 2012.
    Author:
    Joerg Wicker (wicker@uni-mainz.de)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      weka.core.Instance transformInstance​(weka.core.Instance x)
      Transforms the instance in the prediction process before given to the internal multi-label or multi-target classifier.
      weka.core.Instances transformLabels​(weka.core.Instances D)
      The method to transform the labels into another set of latent labels, typically a compression method is used, e.g., Boolean matrix decomposition in the case of MLC-BMaD, or matrix multiplication based on SVD for PLST.
      double[] transformPredictionsBack​(double[] y)
      Transforms the predictions of the internal classifier back to the original labels.

      • transformLabels

        public weka.core.Instances transformLabels​(weka.core.Instances D)
                                    throws Exception
        The method to transform the labels into another set of latent labels, typically a compression method is used, e.g., Boolean matrix decomposition in the case of MLC-BMaD, or matrix multiplication based on SVD for PLST.
        Specified by:
        transformLabels in class LabelTransformationClassifier
        Parameters:
        D - the instances to transform into new instances with transformed labels. The Instances consist of features and original labels.
        Returns:
        The resulting instances. Instances consist of features and transformed labels.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • transformPredictionsBack

        public double[] transformPredictionsBack​(double[] y)
        Transforms the predictions of the internal classifier back to the original labels.
        Specified by:
        transformPredictionsBack in class LabelTransformationClassifier
        Parameters:
        y - The predictions that should be transformed back. The array consists only of the predictions as they are returned from the internal classifier.
        Returns:
        The transformed predictions.

      • transformInstance

        public weka.core.Instance transformInstance​(weka.core.Instance x)
                                     throws Exception
        Transforms the instance in the prediction process before given to the internal multi-label or multi-target classifier. The instance is passed having the original set of labels, these must be replaced with the transformed labels (attributes) so that the internla classifier can predict them.
        Specified by:
        transformInstance in class LabelTransformationClassifier
        Parameters:
        x - The instance to transform. Consists of features and labels.
        Returns:
        The transformed instance. Consists of features and transformed labels.
        Throws:
        Exception
